channel.title: CVE Feed for Weblizar -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Weblizar -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-34628|2024-08-04T00:19:47.653Z -- weblizar -- admin%20custom%20login
item.description: The Admin Custom Login WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery due to the loginbgSave action found in the ~/includes/Login-form-setting/Login-form-background.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 3.2.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-33911|2024-08-02T02:42:59.811Z -- weblizar -- school%20management%20pro
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Weblizar School Management Pro.This issue affects School Management Pro: from n/a through 10.3.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-33911|2024-07-17T18:44:48.571Z -- weblizar -- school%20management%20pro
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Weblizar School Management Pro.This issue affects School Management Pro: from n/a through 10.3.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-1858|2024-03-29T06:43:59.098Z -- weblizar -- lightbox%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20responsive%20lightbox%20gallery
item.description: The Lightbox slider – Responsive Lightbox Gallery plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to PHP Object Injection in all versions up to, and including, 1.9.9 via deserialization of untrusted input through post meta data. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject a PHP Object. No known POP chain is present in the vulnerable plugin. If a POP chain is present via an additional plugin or theme installed on the target system, it could allow the attacker to delete arbitrary files, retrieve sensitive data, or execute code.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Weblizar School Management Pro.This issue affects School Management Pro: from n/a through 10.3.4.
